channel.title: Help Sheet Advice
channel.description:
![newbynew|690x398](upload://6rvgkoUgiCCCM2JiFvKth244IV7.png)
In an attempt to get to grips with the game I made myself this , can those a bit wiser than me check and make sure that it seems correct . In particular I am unsure when people are visiting others and when they are using an ability on them . Is this one and the same ?
